Texts.Chs: 我相信你现在应该可以使用这些能量了，但是你需要将它们具体化。我已经为你们把它们结晶了，但是你现在可以自己这样做了。去找一处铁砧去锻造你的新星，去制造属于你自己的“崩星”。
Texts.Eng: I believe you should be able to use these now, but you will need to crystallize them. I have crystallized them for you, but you can now do so yourself. Go build the Nova in an anvil and cause your own 'collapse'.

Texts.Chs: 你的魔法力量正在逐步增强，我在一本远古魔术师的残破笔记中发现，有一种魔法石中含有微量的恒星能量。我相信^green;低语精灵，棱光海狮和月海天蚕蛾^reset;会在死亡时凝聚出这些碎片。也有传言说^green;某些神出鬼没的小狗狗^reset;以此为食。^white;
Texts.Eng: Your magical power is growing by the second, and it triggered a collapse that let me search through a long lost archive written by old magicians. Records indicate that a magical stone holds energy fueled by stars. I believe ^green;Wisper, Narfin, and Lumoth^reset; can produce these crystals upon death. There are also rumors of a ^green;shadowy puppy^reset; that eats them.^white;
